Author: Banh Mi Dac Biet
Content: Higher FPS just means a smoother experience for the player which can increase those. It only gives the benefit of being able to react better.

Author: Hanky
Content: pubg_ csgo_ cod and battlefield has had some issues with this for a while and it's impossible to remove_ pubg was especially a problem with this because of the spaghetti coding

Author: Zel
Content: Hi.  Most games work on a system that means the code that runs the game and determines damage is separated from the code that renders the game on your screen.  It makes multi-threading the game easier and makes it run smoother.  Just saying.

Author: Banh Mi Dac Biet
Content: Apex’s issue is due to their server tickrate. It tries to give you a high tick rate but falls to 30% of its max due to inefficient data transfer.

Author: Banh Mi Dac Biet
Content: It’s not FPS dependent but rather the server not knowing how to handle different loads and ping properly.
